issue.title: C++: Arrow to Parquet Schema conversion
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-92](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-92). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
For writing Parquet files we need to transform Arrow's schema into one for parquet-cpp.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-92?focusedCommentId=15255664) by Uwe Korn (uwe):*
To make the actual schema conversion complete, we probably need the physical structure too as Arrow schemas only care about logical types whereas Parquet schema is about logical and physical types.

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-92?focusedCommentId=15265991) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
Issue resolved by pull request 68
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/68>
